channel.title: Future on OranLooney.com
channel.description: Recent content in Future on OranLooney.com

item.title: Eight Billion People
item.description: Today is the last day when the number of people alive will start with a seven. Sometime late Tuesday afternoon, or perhaps early Wednesday morning, the population will cross the eight billion mark. When I was a kid, the number they taught us in school was five billion. By the time I was in college, it was up to six, and a decade ago it hit seven. Now it’s at eight.
